    • 构造器详细资料

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon()
        Creates a default instance of a triangle.
        Postcondition:
        A triangle with side length of 100 is created at 100,100.

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon(double x,
                      double y,
                      int n,
                      double s)
        Create a instance of a regular polygon.
        参数:
        x - x coordinate of the center
        y - y coordinate of the center
        n - number of sides
        s - length of sides
        Precondition:
        all dimensions but be positive except for length
        Postcondition:
        a regular polygon with center coordinate x,y, sides of n, and side length of s is created.

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        Determines whether the point x,y is contained inside this polygon.
        指定者:
        isPointInside 在类中 Shape
        参数:
        x - The X-coordinate of the point.
        y - The Y-coordinate of the point.
        返回:
        True if point is inside, false if point is outside.
